# believe_pep_talk (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "believe_pep_talk" "example_pep_talk" {
  stream = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `stream` (Boolean) If true, returns SSE stream instead of full response

### Read-Only

- `chunks` (Attributes List) Individual chunks of the pep talk (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--chunks))
- `text` (String) The full pep talk text

<a id="nestedatt--chunks"></a>
### Nested Schema for `chunks`

Read-Only:

- `chunk_id` (Number) Chunk sequence number
- `emotional_beat` (String) The emotional purpose of this chunk (e.g., greeting, acknowledgment, wisdom, affirmation, encouragement)
- `is_final` (Boolean) Is this the final chunk
- `text` (String) The text of this chunk
